prompt: The street is quiet but you hear a distant moan. Zombies? Enemies? only one way to find out. Start your journey.

You start the car and drive down the deserted street. Most stores have been abandoned and looted. Soon, you reach a barricade blocking the road. Do you want to get out and investigate or try to drive around?

You get out and look around the barricade. Only to find food wrappers, dirty clothes, and signs of a struggle. Suddenly, a zombie appears around the corner! The zombie is weak and separated from the main horde. Do you want to fight it or run away?
You fight the zombie and defeat it. Your weapon takes some damage, but you survive the encounter.
You tried to fight the zombie, but your weapon was too weak and You are hurt.
You find a nearby building that looks like it could provide shelter. Do you want to enter it or continue your journey towards the Military Base?
Inside the building, the air is stale and the floor creaks under your feet. Do you want to go upstairs or stay on the ground floor?
The floor is rotted and giving way. As you try to go upstairs, the weakened floor collapses and you fall back down to the first floor, taking damage in the process.

As you slowly approach one of the rooms on the ground floor, you see a zombie standing right in front of a medical bag. The sight sends a shiver down your spine. Do you want to run and quickly grab the medical bag or fight the zombie?

You dash forward to grab the medical bag, but the doctor zombie lunges and slashes across your arm. Pain shoots through your body as you lose 20 health. Stumbling back, you realize the bag is out of reach — and the supplies are lost to you.
You stumble back, clutching your wounded arm. The doctor zombie snarls and stands guard over the medical bag. You retreat deeper into the building, leaving the supplies behind.

After defeating the zombie, you open the bag and notice a small vial labeled 'Antidote' lying inside. This key item can cure the infection caused by a zombie bite, but you can only use it once. Do you want to pick up the Antidote? (The map is a place holder key item with no effect)
You carefully place the Antidote in your inventory, knowing it could be a lifesaver in the future.
You decide to leave the Antidote behind, feeling uncertain about carrying it. You continue your journey without it.

You tried to fight the zombie, but your efforts weren't enough. The zombie overpowers you and sinks its teeth into your arm. The bite quickly shows signs of infection, and without a chance to use an antidote, your fate seems sealed. Your vision fades as the infection takes hold.
You make your way back to the car, your heart racing with every step. The streets are eerily quiet, but you can still feel the presence of danger lurking around every corner.

As your car speeds along the open road, the engine's roar and the rush of wind remind you of the power beneath your feet. Yet the road ahead remains uncertain. You continue, running over debris and hearing weird noises from the engine. Do you slam the pedal to the floor and embrace breakneck speed, or do you ease off and slow down to better survey your surroundings?

You lose control of the car when a sudden swerve overwhelms your focus. The vehicle careens violently toward a hotel, and the collision is disastrous. The impact sends shattering metal and shards of glass flying in every direction. For a moment, the world fades to black—a cacophony of noise and blurred light fills your senses. As you slowly regain consciousness, your body aches with every movement, and you struggle to understand the magnitude of what just happened.

After the crash, you make your way slowly on foot through the wreckage. As you navigate the debris-strewn road, you notice a lone figure in the distance. Drawing nearer, you realize it’s a woman—her eyes vacant and her face contorting with pain as she seems to teeter between humanity and zombification. The transformation has begun. Do you risk approaching her to see if you can help, or do you keep your distance and continue on your way?

You decide not to linger and keep walking, but as soon as you turn away, the zombie woman breaks into a hasty pursuit. Her guttural moans echo behind you as her shuffling footsteps close the gap. Heart pounding, you sprint down the street, desperate to escape the relentless chase. Do you try to find a place to hide or push yourself to run even faster?

You stop and turn to face the zombie woman. As she lunges at you, you manage to dodge her grasp and counter with a swift kick. The impact sends her stumbling back, momentarily disoriented. Seizing the opportunity, you deliver a decisive blow that incapacitates her. Breathing heavily, you watch as she collapses to the ground, no longer a threat. You feel a mix of relief and sorrow, knowing that you had to fight someone who was once human.

You try to fight the zombie woman, but she quickly overpowers you. Before you have a chance to react, she clamps her jaws around you, tearing into your flesh. In a horrifying, relentless assault, she begins to devour you piece by piece, your screams swallowed by the darkness. Everything fades into oblivion as you are consumed. Game Over. (Every choice can have dangerous consequences—press reset to play again)

As you catch your breath after the fierce battle, the echo of fading footsteps mixes with the tense silence of a world reborn in chaos. In the distance, emerging from the haze of a broken cityscape, you glimpse the towering gates of the military base, their iron frames silhouetted against a blood-tinged sky. Every scar on your body and every beat of your heart testifies to the struggle for survival. Against all odds, you have overcome the nightmare—today, hope still burns. You made it. You Win! (Press reset to play again)

Despite your best efforts to outrun her, the zombie woman closes the distance with terrifying speed. She lunges forward and sinks her teeth into your arm, and the infection begins to spread through your veins. In that crucial moment, your fate hangs in the balance. Do you fight back with the antidote, or resign yourself to the inevitable?

You quickly administer the antidote, and a wave of relief washes over you as the infection is halted. Weakened but resolute, you stagger through a landscape of shattered glass and twisted metal. The ruins of the old world stretch before you, yet in the distance, an imposing fortress looms—the military base, its high walls and steady lights a promise of sanctuary. Every painful step brings you closer to safety; the base's fortified gates inspire hope amidst despair. Against all odds, you cross its threshold. Victory is yours. You Win! (Press reset to play again)

The infection takes hold rapidly, and your vision blurs as your body succumbs to the virus. In your final moments, you feel a cold numbness spreading through you, and everything fades to black. Game Over. (Every choice can have dangerous consequences—press reset to play again)

You cautiously approach the afflicted woman. As you get closer, you notice that while the infection has already begun to take hold of her, her eyes still hold a glimpse of the person she once was. Do you risk administering the antidote in hopes of saving a life, or do you decide that it's safer to walk away and focus on your own survival?

You carefully administer the antidote to the woman. As the serum enters her system, you watch in awe as the signs of infection begin to recede. Her eyes regain their focus, and for a moment, she seems to be herself again. "Thank you," she whispers, before collapsing into unconsciousness.

You managed to save the woman from the brink of death. As she slowly regains consciousness, you feel a sense of hope. Together you both walk aimlessly down the road until you reach the military base. You made it. You Win! (Press reset to play again)

You decide to drive at a moderate speed, keeping a steady pace as you navigate the road. The car hums along smoothly, and you feel a sense of control. However, as you round a bend, you suddenly see a hoard of zombies blocking the road ahead. Do you want to stop and fight the hoard or run them over with the car?

In the crucible of battle, you defy impossible odds and repel the relentless tide of zombies. Though your weapon bears the scars of a brutal fight, you stand resolute amid the chaos. Each trembling, determined step carries you closer to salvation, as the distant glow of the military base transforms into a brilliant beacon of hope against the night. Its towering, fortified walls promise sanctuary from the darkness—a realm where despair is replaced by the promise of new beginnings. With fierce determination, you push through the debris and cross the Military base’s threshold. Against all odds, you have overcome. Victory is yours. You Win! (Press reset to play again)

You tried to fight the hoard of zombies, but they overwhelm you. You are bitten and the infection quickly spreads through your body. Everything goes black. Game Over. (Every choice can have dangerous consequences, press reset to play again)
After being overpowered by the hoard, you have been bitten—your life now hangs in the balance as the infection sets in. Do you choose to fight back with the antidote or accept your fate?

You quickly administer the antidote, and a wave of relief washes over you as the infection is halted. Weakened but resolute, you stagger through a landscape of shattered glass and twisted metal. The ruins of the old world stretch before you, yet in the distance, an imposing fortress looms—the military base, its high walls and steady lights a promise of sanctuary. Every painful step brings you closer to safety; the base's fortified gates inspire hope amidst despair. Against all odds, you cross its threshold, marking a hard-won victory. You Win! (Press reset to play again)

You slam on the accelerator, and your car barrels forward like a raging beast. In one cataclysmic moment, you crash into the horde of zombies—metal screams and bone shatters as the vehicle crushes the undead with ruthless force. The impact reverberates through the night, and as chaos erupts around you, the car spirals wildly, hurtling toward a looming tree. In a collision of fate and metal, you crash into the trunk, the world exploding in a haze of shattered glass and twisted steel, leaving you dazed and wounded.

Bruised and battered, you push forward through the wreckage and ruin. With every agonizing step, the military base looms closer—a steadfast beacon amidst chaos. Against all odds and despite your injuries, you cross its threshold, triumphant and resolute. Victory is yours. You Win! (Press reset to play again)

You feel the bite and the infection starting to spread through your veins. You check your inventory and see the Antidote. Do you want to use it to cure yourself, or let the infection take over and transform you into one of them?

The infection spreads rapidly through your body. Your strength fades as your vision blurs, the world darkening with every heartbeat.Everything goes black. Game Over. (Every choice can have dangerous consequences, press reset to play again)
reset the game
